activeProgramsDescription: Your currently active exercise programs and assessments
endedProgramsDescription: Your completed exercise programs and assessments

favoriteActivities.title: Favorite Activities
favoriteActivities.description: Choose up to 3 activities you are not able to enjoy or accomplish and select which body area restricts you to do these activities again
favoriteActivities.selectBodyAreas: Select which body area restricts you from doing each activity

step3.title: Exercise Program Assessment
step3.description: Based on your favorite activities and selected body areas, we've prepared a personalized assessment questionnaire.
